concept.name: lumen [Entity] (SI base luminous flux unit. It is the amount streaming outward through one solid angle of 1 Steradian from a uniform point source having an intensity of one Candela.)

attr.obj: systeme international unit (The class of Systeme International (SI) units.)
unit of luminous flux (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of luminous flux measure)

concept.name: yoctolumen [Entity] (luminous flux unit equal to 0.000000000000000000000001 lumen)

attr.obj: unit of luminous flux (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of luminous flux measure)

attr.rel: be derived from base unit ((about derived unit) to be derived, by division or multiplication, from base unit)
be derived from base unit by division by number ((about derived unit) to be derived from base unit by division by number)
